title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Dems use San Jose shooting to push gun control. Josh Hawley and Lindsey Graham on the Wuhan lab investigation. More than a year ago Rush asked the questions about the ChiComs and the virus that are being asked now. James O'Keefe and Project Veritas strike again. David Wright of ABC News admits they didn't give Trump credit for anything because that's what their bosses wanted.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Lockheed Martin goes woke. Rush on how liberalism undermines our great institutions. Georgia and Arizona recounts. Hunter Biden brought VP Joe to dinner with shady business partners. Rush on the Hunter Biden story during the campaign. The Deep State protects the Bidens. The Ohio vaccine lottery.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

The Ohio vaccine lottery. Government trying to coerce teens to get the vaccine. Biden flip flops. Ken on John Kerry and Gina McCarthy, Biden's climate czars. Rush on the left's decades long scam on climate change. Andrew Cuomo's approval rating down. Rush on Cuomo's dismal failures. EIB High Note: Old-fashioned values lead to act of kindness. Rush on American values.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
